name: Color Whooper - Whopper Tower
description:
Once again, your newest addiction of hyper-casual game comes in 3D!
Drag your ball to smash the blocks and throw the blocks from the colorful platforms, but if you hit a red one, it's all over! Your ball shatters to pieces and you have to start all over again.

Color Whooper features:
- Ball drag speed control from sensitivity.
- Colorful blocky shapes
- Crazy fast speed
- Fun gameplay
- 1000+ levels
- Amazing hurdels like bomb don't get close to them. It blast when reached to the ground.
- Bright vibrant graphics
- Simple and easy to play
- Great time killer
